title: NotesApp Example Notebook
description: A demonstration of NotesApp features and capabilities

objects.content:
# Welcome to NotesApp

This is a **powerful** note-taking application built with C++ and Qt 6.

## Features

- **Markdown Support**: Full markdown rendering with live preview
- **Freeform Drawing**: Pen input with multiple drawing modes
- **Object Manipulation**: Drag, resize, and layer objects freely
- **SQLite Storage**: Robust data persistence with auto-save
- **Modern UI**: Dark theme with professional appearance

## Drawing Example

This page demonstrates the drawing capabilities:

- **Blue Line**: Drawn with the pen tool
- **Yellow Line**: Highlighted with the highlighter tool

You can:
- Select and move individual strokes
- Change colors and pen width
- Use different drawing modes
- Erase parts of your drawings

# Getting Started

## Creating Your First Note

1. **New Document**: Press `Ctrl+N` or File â†’ New Document
2. **Add Text**: Click the Text tool (T) and click on the page
3. **Start Drawing**: Select the Pen tool (P) and draw freely
4. **Save Your Work**: Press `Ctrl+S` to save

## Keyboard Shortcuts

| Action | Shortcut |
|--------|----------|
| New Document | `Ctrl+N` |
| Save Document | `Ctrl+S` |
| Add Text | `Ctrl+T` |
| Add Drawing | `Ctrl+D` |
| Select Tool | `S` |
| Pen Tool | `P` |
| Zoom In | `Ctrl++` |
| Zoom Out | `Ctrl+-` |

## Tips and Tricks

### Object Manipulation
- **Select Multiple**: Hold `Ctrl` and click objects
- **Move Objects**: Drag selected objects around the page
- **Resize**: Use the corner handles when an object is selected
- **Layer Order**: Use the Object Properties panel to change layer order

### Drawing Tips
- **Smooth Lines**: The pen tool automatically smooths your strokes
- **Change Colors**: Use the color picker in the toolbar
- **Adjust Width**: Use the width slider for different line thicknesses
- **Erase Mistakes**: Switch to the eraser tool to remove strokes

### Text Editing
- **Markdown**: Use markdown syntax for rich formatting
- **Live Preview**: See your markdown rendered in real-time
- **Font Options**: Change fonts, sizes, and colors in the properties panel
- **Alignment**: Left, center, or right align your text blocks
